Villagers.name: Villager
Villagers.description: An ordinary townsperson with no special abilities. Their goal is to identify and eliminate all werewolves.

Villagers.name: Seer
Villagers.description: Each night, the Seer can learn the true identity (Werewolf or Villager) of one player. Their goal is to use this information to help the village identify the werewolves.

Villagers.name: Doctor
Villagers.description: The Doctor can choose one person to protect each night, including themselves, preventing that person from being killed by the werewolves.

Villagers.name: Hunter
Villagers.description: If the Hunter is killed (by vote or by werewolves), they can immediately kill one other player in revenge.

Villagers.name: Cupid
Villagers.description: On the first night, Cupid selects two players to be lovers. If one lover dies, the other dies of heartbreak. The lovers win if they are the last players standing, regardless of their original teams.

Werewolves.name: Werewolf
Werewolves.description: Each night, the werewolves choose one player to kill. They must remain hidden and deceive the villagers during the day to avoid being lynched.

Werewolves.name: Alpha Werewolf
Werewolves.description: The Alpha Werewolf is the leader of the werewolves and may have additional abilities, such as being immune to the Seer's visions or being able to convert villagers into werewolves.

Werewolves.name: Mystic Werewolf
Werewolves.description: The Mystic Werewolf can see who the Seer is checking each night, allowing them to better strategize and mislead the village.

Special Roles.name: Sorceress
Special Roles.description: The Sorceress has two potions: one to save a player from death and one to kill a player. Each potion can be used only once in the game.

Special Roles.name: Tanner
Special Roles.description: The Tanner hates his job and wants to die. He wins if he gets himself lynched by the village.

Special Roles.name: Doppelganger
Special Roles.description: At the start of the game, the Doppelganger chooses another player's name to copy and assumes all abilities and win conditions of that name for the rest of the game.

Special Roles.name: Cursed
Special Roles.description: The Cursed appears as a normal villager to the Seer, but if the werewolves try to kill the Cursed, he becomes a werewolf.

Roles to be Added.name: Priest
Roles to be Added.description: The Priest can bless one player per night, protecting them from being killed by the werewolves.

Roles to be Added.name: Knight
Roles to be Added.description: The Knight can challenge one player to a duel. If the challenged player is a werewolf, they die; otherwise, the Knight dies.

Roles to be Added.name: Wolf Cub
Roles to be Added.description: The Wolf Cub is a young werewolf. If the Wolf Cub is killed, the werewolves get to make two kills the following night in retaliation.

Roles to be Added.name: Lycan
Roles to be Added.description: The Lycan is a villager who, due to a curse, appears as a werewolf to the Seer. This makes them a potential target to be voted out despite their innocence.
